parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92</value></part><part><name>Game Version </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Execution ("server" or empty)</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets wanted H position for 2D control. [[ctrlCommit]] is required to complete the operation. </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> controlName [[ctrlSetPositionH]] h </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>controlName: [[Control]] - 2D control

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>h: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Return Value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[ctrlSetPositionH]] 0.5;
_ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 1;</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctrlSetPosition]] [[ctrlSetPositionX]] [[ctrlSetPositionY]] [[ctrlSetPositionW]] </value></part><part><name>See Also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
